Class WindowCloser

  • java.lang.Object
    • WindowCloser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class WindowCloser
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.WindowListener
    Implements a window listener to detect when a user wishes to close, or exit, the application by using the ESC key or Exit button in the window panel.
